sections.title: 1984 ACL MEMBERSHIP LIST
paragraphs: Following is a listing, of. the 1984 members of the Association for Computational Linguistics as of the time this issue of Computational Linguistics went into production. Personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. Institutional members follow, ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name; for the United States, the sorting is by ZIP-code. Personal
